channel.title: Weird errors
channel.description:
im geting a weird error when i compile my client (i didnt edit it yet or anything i got it when i tried to compile it after editing the server name)
this is the error
setcolour(2.0x0000FF,"chat colour reset', "@cr2@");
thats how it starts and it keeps going (77 errors) if someone can help me in team viewer it would be highly appreciated idk if im aloud to give papal money or rsgp ill do any (if its aloud) thanks my msn is Lukapruidzee@live.com add me or just message me here please
